comments:
On some machines Eclipse is unable to open MSWord document inside workbench. 
This results in grey window with red label that view cannot be created. 
Meanwhile word document can be opened inside other containders such as Internet 
Explorer. This happens *for example* with MSWord 2000 + Eclipse 20011219 (it 
runs on some machines with this configuration). The exact reason is unknown, 
accordingly to msdn it is a result of internal word exception or memory access 
violation. Proposal is to catch such failure (if not possible to fix) and 
suggest user to reinstall Word.

Log: Mon Feb 11 11:06:47 GMT+01:00 2002

Mike, please take a look. 

If all OleClients are expected to catch this exception, it would be better to 
put this code in once in SWT, instead of replicating it in all clients.

The problem described is a bug which will not be fixed in the current version 
of eclipse.

If you would like to contribute a fix for this problem, please attach a patch 
file and reopen this bug report.

Probably related to bug #49098.
Works for me in 3.3M6.

traces.message: Failed to create Ole Client. result = -2147417851
